moves.1... e5 2. f4 Nc6 3. fxe5 Nxe5 4. d4: Hmmm, don't move pieces twice in dev. Thats what they drum into you. So I didn't.
moves.4... Qh4+: Hoping for g3, but thats optimistic.
moves.5. Ke2 Qxe4+ 6. Kf2: That surprised me, b-e3 would have been my choice.
moves.6... Ng4+ 7. Kg3 Bd6+: Still not expecting much, just taking the opportunity to develop unopposed.
moves.8. Kh3: Bad move, bad bad move. Not a lot of choices, as it allows me a fork on K/Q....
moves.8... Nf2#: Oh. Right. Well ok then. No I didn't realise. I was just being greedy and nabbing the queen I thought. Sorry ;-)
